name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Charles R. GOINS, Appellant

judges: Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT and HUTCHINSON, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Charles R. GOINS, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Judgments of sentence affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: R. Anthony Toto, Philadelphia, Court-appointed, for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Jane Greenspan, Asst. Dist. Atty., for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
442 A.2d 246
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Charles R. GOINS, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted Jan. 18, 1982.
Decided March 16, 1982.
R. Anthony Toto, Philadelphia, Court-appointed, for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Jane Greenspan, Asst. Dist. Atty., for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT and HUTCHINSON, JJ.
